mapper.insert: INSERT INTO appraisal(star, comment, start_date, end_date, co_prv, status_no) VALUES(#{star}, #{comment}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{coPrv}, #{statusNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bookshelf WHERE isbn=#{isbn} AND user_no=#{userNo}

SELECT appraisal.appraisal_no, appraisal.star, appraisal.comment, appraisal.start_date, appraisal.end_date, appraisal.status_no, user.id, user.origin_pic, user.pass FROM bookshelf INNER JOIN appraisal ON bookshelf.status_no = appraisal.status_no INNER JOIN user ON bookshelf.user_no = user.user_no WHERE bookshelf.isbn = #{isbn} AND appraisal.co_prv = '공개'
SELECT COUNT(comment) FROM bookshelf INNER JOIN appraisal ON bookshelf.status_no = appraisal.status_no WHERE bookshelf.isbn = #{isbn} AND appraisal.co_prv = '공개'

SELECT star FROM appraisal INNER JOIN bookshelf ON bookshelf.status_no = appraisal.status_no INNER JOIN user ON user.user_no = bookshelf.user_no WHERE bookshelf.isbn = #{isbn} AND user.user_no = #{userNo};
